attributes.action: Outlaw Talking Non-Human Primates from Possible Future Earths
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the same way that the Government has seen fit to put 42 day detention on to the statute books in case they ever need it, but not that they would ever use it, but just in case, because it's better to have it there now than try to get it later, I propose that the Government introduce legislation to permanently detain or destroy any non-human primates who are capable of talking, in case they have come from a future possible Earth with the intention of replacing mankind as the dominant species and subjecting all human life to slavery.

Belts as well as braces I say. Hopefully this day will never come, but just in case it does it would be easier to get this legislation on the statute books now before it's too late. All humans should join me in shouting "Take your stinking paws off me, you damned dirty ape!" while we still can.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
